Question
========
After committing in Positron, what indicates your local branch is ahead of the remote?

Answerlist
----------
* The repository disappears from the Git panel
* The main branch is behind origin/main by one commit
* The main branch is ahead of origin/main by one commit
* The README file is locked for editing

Solution
========
A local commit puts your local main branch ahead of origin/main until you push.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
